members.title: President
members.name: Mohit Mohan
members.summary: Mohit Mohan was Appointed as President of Students chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019 .His Goals is to obtain a position that will enable to use his strong organizational skills, award-winning educational background, and ability to work well with people.
members.description:
Mohit Mohan was Appointed as President at Students chapter of International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019 .His Goals is to obtain a position that will enable to use his strong Technical skills, award-winning educational background, and ability to work well with people. Mohit started out as Electronics and Instrumentation, and now blends in Circuits to create a Artworks.' Mohit's innovations in using Electronics to express art have created a youth culture, in which he remains at the forefront. Mohit has become an inspiration to many up and coming students. However, the part Mohit insists is most important to him, is that he's helped many troubled youth take control of their lives, and create their own unique, positive futuresponse. Seeing kids he's mentored pursuing a grduation from a college, gives art the purpose that Mohit so craves.

Mohit's Coordinated many workshop at ISA HIT Student Chapter like(ANA-DIGITRIX, AUTOMATIZE,TECH QUIZ).He exhibit project on the topic of Smart Gyser in Industrial & Advancement in ISA Competition.

members.title: Vice President
members.name: Rishav Kumar
members.summary: Rishav Kumar was Appointed as Vice President of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, and has won the prizes for Prototype competition on Home & Industrial Automation, Fun from Junk organized by Prayukti. He has qualified for Skillathon'18 (National Championship's on AI) organized by e-cell IIT Guwahati. State level winner of Vedic Mathematics.
members.description:
Rishav Kumar was Appointed as Vice President of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, and has won the prizes for Prototype competition on Home & Industrial Automation, Fun from Junk organized by Prayukti. He has qualified for Skillathon'18 (National Championship's on AI) organized by e-cell IIT Guwahati. State level winner of Vedic Mathematics.

He has compeleted training in Reactor Engineering Division at Bhabha Atomic Research Centre(BARC),Mumbai,India. Also, he has instructor of different workshop like Circuittrix,Robotics,Ana-Digitrix,Automatize,PCB Designing etc.

members.title: Secretary
members.name: Ritlal Prasad Verma
members.summary: Ritlal Prasad Verma was Appointed as Secretary of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, He has completed Industrial traning at Haldia Petrochemicals and, also completed training of PLC at MSME. He exhibit Project on Smart Home Automation at Home & Industrial Automation Competition organized by ISA Kokata Section.
members.description:
Ritlal Prasad Verma was Appointed as Secretary of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, He has completed Industrial traning at Haldia Petrochemicals and, also completed training of PLC at MSME. He exhibit Project on Smart Home Automation at Home & Industrial Automation Competition organized by ISA Kokata Section.

He has won so many prize like( Robowar, Fun from Junk, Lakshya, Jugaad Technology, etc.) at IIT Kharagpur,IIT Dhanbad,HIT Haldia

members.title: Women's Head
members.name: Rasmita Panda
members.summary: Rasmita Panda was Appointed as Women's Head of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, She Coordinated a Workshop on Automatize using Arduino, Tech Quiz. She secured 2nd Position in JuGGAD Technology in Prayukti, 2nd Prize in INPROMTU at HIT, 2nd position in One Act Play in Annual Cultural meet 2018 at HIT.
members.description:
Rasmita Panda was Appointed as Women's Head of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, She Coordinated a Workshop on Automatize using Arduino, Tech Quiz.

She secured 2nd Position in JuGGAD Technology in Prayukti, 2nd Prize in INPROMTU at HIT, 2nd position in One Act Play in Annual Cultural meet 2018 at HIT.

members.title: Membership Chair
members.name: Shunbul Faizan
members.summary: Shunbul Faizan was Appointed as Membership Chair of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, She has won 1st Prize in poster presentation on Carbon nanotubes in National Seminar of chemistry organized by ICARE, 1st Prize in Juggad Technology in Prayukti, 3rd Position in NSSC organized by IIT Kharagpur.
members.description:
Shunbul Faizan was Appointed as Membership Chair of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, She has won 1st Prize in poster presentation on Carbon nanotubes in National Seminar of chemistry organized by ICARE, 1st Prize in Juggad Technology in Prayukti, 3rd Position in NSSC organized by IIT Kharagpur.

She retains good knowledge in Computer Networking, proficient with Data Science and ML, She adequate knowledge in Artificial Neural Network, she has completed project on the topic of Covid-19 data Analysis using Python and NLP based tool for AI Powered humanities research using python.

members.title: Membership Chair
members.name: Shubham Verma
members.summary: Shubham Verma was Appointed as Membership Chair of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, and has Runner up in Arm of Achelous at IIT Kharagpur, He has done a research paper on Text mining ancient texts for human experience and wisdom in dealing with difficult periods of human history of plague and pestilence through a NLP based programmatic tool that brings to power of AI and big data analysis to research in humanities (https://doi.org/10.31235/osf.io/p4q9c) and Automated identification of small drug molecules for Hepatitis C virus through a novel programmatic tool and extensive Molecular Dynamics studies of select drug candidates (https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.07.07.192518).
members.description: Shubham Verma was Appointed as Membership Chair of student chapter at International society of Automation(ISA),HIT,Haldia in 2019, and has Runner up in Arm of Achelous at IIT Kharagpur, He has done a research paper on Text mining ancient texts for human experience and wisdom in dealing with difficult periods of human history of plague and pestilence through a NLP based programmatic tool that brings to power of AI and big data analysis to research in humanities (https://doi.org/10.31235/osf.io/p4q9c) and Automated identification of small drug molecules for Hepatitis C virus through a novel programmatic tool and extensive Molecular Dynamics studies of select drug candidates (https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.07.07.192518).
